resources.string: An unknown error has occurred. Please contact androidsupport@microchip.com so that we can determine the source of the issue and attempt to fix it.

The Android OS version that you are running is missing the com.android.future.usb library that is required to run this demo. The OS version that you are running should contain these libraries. Please contact androidsupport@microchip.com so that we can work to correct this issue for this device.

The firmware version on the attached device requires a protocol that is not supported by this version of the application. Please check the Android Marketplace to see if there is an update available for this application. If you are using the source version, please check www.microchip.com/mal for the latest application source code.

This is an alarm application that interfaces with the Wheelphone to provide a playful experience when the alarm rings. \nSimply set an alarm (for the next 24 hours). Alternatively, you can quickly set an alarm 5 seconds from the current time by pressing the \"Quick alarm\" button. \nhttp://www.wheelphone.com
